_source.productDescription:
Undisputed masters of murderous riffs, pugnacious grooves and ferocious hooks since 1991, Machine Head are long established as one of the most influential and incendiary bands in the metal world. Exploding into the world's consciousness with 1994's seminal Burn My Eyes album, the now legendary Oakland crew brutishly redefined what it meant to be heavy, incorporating a wild array of influences into some of the sharpest and most brutal metal anthems ever written.

A perennially vital force in heavy music, Machine Head have continued their exhilarating evolution, while never losing the furious spirit of their old school, underground roots. Impervious to trends and proud to stand alone: Machine Head is still the bulldozer that crushes all!
_source.productShortDescription: Undisputed masters of murderous riffs, pugnacious grooves and ferocious hooks since 1991, Machine Head are long established as one of the most influential and incendiary

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have  Braille and tactile signage on all information and paths of travel
Provide information in large print
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Modify your cooking and cleaning practices to cater for people with food allergies or chemical intolerances (could include menus with meals free from: nuts, dairy, seafood, eggs, gluten etc)
Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available (make this available on your website).

productComments.commentText:
Undisputed masters of murderous riffs, pugnacious grooves and ferocious hooks since 1991, Machine Head are long established as one of the most influential and incendiary bands in the metal world. Exploding into the world's consciousness with 1994's seminal Burn My Eyes album, the now legendary Oakland crew brutishly redefined what it meant to be heavy, incorporating a wild array of influences into some of the sharpest and most brutal metal anthems ever written.

A perennially vital force in heavy music, Machine Head have continued their exhilarating evolution, while never losing the furious spirit of their old school, underground roots. Impervious to trends and proud to stand alone: Machine Head is still the bulldozer that crushes all!

Mestres indiscutíveis de riffs assassinos, grooves agressivos e ganchos ferozes desde 1991, o Machine Head é há muito tempo consolidado como uma das bandas mais influentes e incendiárias do mundo do metal. Explodindo na consciência mundial com o álbum seminal Burn My Eyes, de 1994, a agora lendária banda de Oakland redefiniu brutalmente o que significava ser pesado, incorporando uma gama selvagem de influências em alguns dos hinos do metal mais afiados e brutais já escritos.

Uma força vital perene na música pesada, o Machine Head continuou sua evolução emocionante, sem nunca perder o espírito furioso de suas raízes underground da velha guarda. Impermeável às tendências e orgulhoso de ser único: o Machine Head ainda é o trator que esmaga tudo!

Master riff yang tak terbantahkan, alur yang agresif, dan hook yang tajam sejak 1991, Machine Head telah lama dikenal sebagai salah satu band paling berpengaruh dan berapi-api di dunia metal. Meledak ke dalam kesadaran dunia dengan album Burn My Eyes yang berpengaruh di tahun 1994, kru legendaris dari Oakland ini dengan brutal mendefinisikan ulang arti heavy metal, menggabungkan beragam pengaruh ke dalam beberapa anthem metal paling tajam dan brutal yang pernah ditulis.

Sebagai kekuatan yang selalu vital dalam musik heavy, Machine Head terus melanjutkan evolusi mereka yang menggembirakan, tanpa pernah kehilangan semangat membara dari akar underground lama mereka. Kebal terhadap tren dan bangga berdiri sendiri: Machine Head tetaplah buldoser yang menghancurkan segalanya!

1991年の創業以来、殺人的なリフ、闘志を燃やすグルーヴ、そして強烈なフックを操るマシーン・ヘッドは、メタル界において最も影響力と刺激に満ちたバンドの一つとして確固たる地位を築いてきました。1994年の画期的なアルバム『Burn My Eyes』で世界中の人々の意識に衝撃を与えた、今や伝説となったオークランド出身のクルーは、ヘヴィとは何かを容赦なく再定義し、様々な影響を融合させた、史上最もシャープでブルータルなメタル・アンセムの数々を生み出しました。

ヘヴィ・ミュージック界の不動の生命力であるマシーン・ヘッドは、オールドスクールでアンダーグラウンドなルーツに宿る激しいスピリットを決して失うことなく、爽快な進化を続けています。トレンドに左右されることなく、唯一無二の存在であることを誇りとするマシーン・ヘッドは、今もなお全てを粉砕するブルドーザーです！

Maîtres incontestés des riffs meurtriers, des grooves pugnaces et des refrains féroces depuis 1991, Machine Head est depuis longtemps reconnu comme l'un des groupes les plus influents et les plus incendiaires du monde du metal. Révélés au monde entier avec l'album phare Burn My Eyes en 1994, les désormais légendaires membres d'Oakland ont brutalement redéfini le heavy, intégrant un large éventail d'influences à des hymnes metal parmi les plus tranchants et brutaux jamais écrits.

Force indéfectible du heavy metal, Machine Head poursuit son évolution exaltante, sans jamais perdre l'esprit furieux de ses racines underground et old school. Insensibles aux tendances et fiers de leur indépendance : Machine Head reste le bulldozer qui écrase tout !

Maestros indiscutibles de riffs asesinos, grooves combativos y ganchos feroces desde 1991, Machine Head se ha consolidado como una de las bandas más influyentes e incendiarias del mundo del metal. Irrumpiendo en la conciencia mundial con el influyente álbum Burn My Eyes de 1994, la ahora legendaria banda de Oakland redefinió brutalmente el significado del heavy, incorporando una amplia gama de influencias en algunos de los himnos metaleros más afilados y brutales jamás escritos.

Una fuerza vital y perenne en la música heavy, Machine Head ha continuado su emocionante evolución, sin perder jamás el espíritu furioso de sus raíces underground de la vieja escuela. Insensibles a las modas y orgullosos de su independencia: ¡Machine Head sigue siendo la excavadora que todo lo aplasta!

Machine Head, seit 1991 unangefochtene Meister mörderischer Riffs, kämpferischer Grooves und wilder Hooks, gelten seit langem als eine der einflussreichsten und aufrührerischsten Bands der Metal-Welt. Mit ihrem bahnbrechenden Album „Burn My Eyes“ von 1994 eroberte die mittlerweile legendäre Crew aus Oakland die Weltöffentlichkeit und definierte den Begriff „Heavy“ brutal neu. Dabei ließ sie eine wilde Palette an Einflüssen in einige der schärfsten und brutalsten Metal-Hymnen aller Zeiten einfließen.

Machine Head, eine zeitlose Kraft der Heavy-Musik, haben ihre aufregende Entwicklung fortgesetzt, ohne dabei den furiosen Geist ihrer Old-School-Underground-Wurzeln zu verlieren. Unempfindlich gegenüber Trends und stolz darauf, allein zu stehen: Machine Head ist immer noch der Bulldozer, der alles zermalmt!

1991년부터 살인적인 리프 투지 넘치는 그루브 맹렬한 후렴구의 명반으로 자리매김한 머신 헤드는 메탈계에서 가장 영향력 있고 강렬한 밴드 중 하나로 오랫동안 자리매김해 왔습니다. 1994년 기념비적인 앨범 Burn My Eyes로 전 세계 음악 팬들의 마음을 사로잡은 이 전설적인 오클랜드 크루는 헤비의 의미를 잔혹하게 재정의하며 다양한 음악적 영향을 가장 날카롭고 잔혹한 메탈 앤섬에 녹여냈습니다.

헤비 음악계에서 끊임없이 중요한 역할을 해 온 머신 헤드는 올드스쿨 언더그라운드의 맹렬한 정신을 잃지 않으면서도 끊임없이 새로운 변화를 시도해 왔습니다. 트렌드에 흔들리지 않고 홀로서기에 자부심을 가진 머신 헤드는 여전히 모든 것을 무너뜨리는 불도저입니다!

自1991年成立以来，Machine Head 就以其凶猛的riff、激烈的律动和凶猛的hook而闻名，长期以来一直是金属乐坛最具影响力和煽动性的乐队之一。1994年，这支来自奥克兰的传奇乐队凭借其开创性的专辑《Burn My Eyes》一炮打响，震撼了全世界。他们以野蛮的方式重新定义了重金属的含义，将各种狂野的元素融入到一些史上最犀利、最残酷的金属金曲中。

Machine Head 是重金属乐坛永恒的活力力量，他们持续着令人振奋的演变，同时又不失其老派地下根源的狂暴精神。不受潮流影响，始终独树一帜：Machine Head 依然是碾压一切的推土机！

Maestri indiscussi di riff assassini, groove combattivi e ritornelli feroci fin dal 1991, i Machine Head si sono affermati da tempo come una delle band più influenti e incendiarie del panorama metal. Esplodendo nell'immaginario collettivo con l'album seminale "Burn My Eyes" del 1994, l'ormai leggendaria crew di Oakland ha ridefinito brutalmente il significato di "heavy metal", incorporando una vasta gamma di influenze in alcuni degli inni metal più taglienti e brutali mai scritti.

Una forza perennemente vitale nella musica heavy, i Machine Head hanno continuato la loro esaltante evoluzione, senza mai perdere lo spirito furioso delle loro radici underground, vecchia scuola. Impermeabili alle tendenze e orgogliosi di essere unici: i Machine Head sono ancora il bulldozer che schiaccia tutto!

自1991年成立以來，Machine Head 就以其兇猛的riff、激烈的律動和兇猛的hook而聞名，長期以來一直是金屬樂壇最具影響力和煽動性的樂隊之一。 1994年，這支來自奧克蘭的傳奇樂團憑藉其開創性的專輯《Burn My Eyes》一炮打響，震撼了全世界。他們以野蠻的方式重新定義了重金屬的意義，將各種狂野的元素融入一些史上最犀利、最殘酷的金屬金曲中。

Machine Head 是重金屬樂壇永恆的活力力量，他們持續著令人振奮的演變，同時又不失其老派地下根源的狂暴精神。不受潮流影響，始終獨樹一格：Machine Head 仍是碾壓一切的推土機！

_source.productDescription:
Robert is turning 22 and you're invited to the best birthday party ever! 

Festivities kick off with Admission gates opening early and celebrate with free entry for kids 14 and under^! 

Australian indie pop trio Sheppard is performing live in the Containers for Change Crocoseum, plus enjoy live Zoo-wide performances by Gubbi Gubbi and African Beat! 

Join professional photographers from CameraPro on a wild walking adventure to learn some epic photography tips* and put your new skills to the test with Robert's Snapshot Safari for your chance to win a Ripper Robert Prize Pack! 

There's tonnes of birthday fun for the whole family to enjoy with Fried Mudd Clay and Little Builders workshops, a giant inflatable obstacle course and free ice cream, while stocks last. 

This is a party you don't want to miss! 

^Terms and Conditions apply. *Limited spots available.
_source.productShortDescription: Robert is turning 22 and you're invited to the best birthday party ever on December 1st!

productComments.commentText:
Robert is turning 22 and you're invited to the best birthday party ever! 

Festivities kick off with Admission gates opening early and celebrate with free entry for kids 14 and under^! 

Australian indie pop trio Sheppard is performing live in the Containers for Change Crocoseum, plus enjoy live Zoo-wide performances by Gubbi Gubbi and African Beat! 

Join professional photographers from CameraPro on a wild walking adventure to learn some epic photography tips* and put your new skills to the test with Robert's Snapshot Safari for your chance to win a Ripper Robert Prize Pack! 

There's tonnes of birthday fun for the whole family to enjoy with Fried Mudd Clay and Little Builders workshops, a giant inflatable obstacle course and free ice cream, while stocks last. 

This is a party you don't want to miss! 

^Terms and Conditions apply. *Limited spots available.

Robert berulang tahun yang ke-22 dan kamu diundang ke pesta ulang tahun terbaik!

Kemeriahan dimulai dengan gerbang masuk yang dibuka lebih awal dan rayakan dengan tiket masuk gratis untuk anak-anak berusia 14 tahun ke bawah^!

Trio indie pop Australia Sheppard akan tampil langsung di Containers for Change Crocoseum, plus nikmati penampilan langsung dari Gubbi Gubbi dan African Beat di seluruh Kebun Binatang!

Bergabunglah dengan fotografer profesional dari CameraPro dalam petualangan berjalan kaki yang seru untuk mempelajari beberapa kiat fotografi epik* dan uji keterampilan barumu dengan Safari Snapshot Robert untuk kesempatan memenangkan Paket Hadiah Ripper Robert!

Ada banyak keseruan ulang tahun untuk dinikmati seluruh keluarga dengan lokakarya Fried Mudd Clay dan Little Builders, rintangan tiup raksasa, dan es krim gratis, selama persediaan masih ada.

Ini adalah pesta yang sayang untuk dilewatkan!

^Syarat dan Ketentuan berlaku. *Tempat terbatas.

ロバートが22歳になりました！最高の誕生日パーティーにご招待します！

入場ゲートが早めにオープンしてお祝いの始まり！14歳以下のお子様は入場無料です^！

オーストラリアのインディーポップトリオ、シェパードがコンテナ・フォー・チェンジ・クロコセウムでライブパフォーマンスを披露！さらに、動物園全体でガッビ・ガッビとアフリカン・ビートのライブパフォーマンスをお楽しみいただけます！

CameraProのプロ写真家と一緒にワイルドなウォーキングアドベンチャーに出かけ、最高の写真撮影のヒントを学びましょう*。ロバートのスナップショットサファリで新しいスキルを試して、リッパー・ロバート賞品パックを獲得するチャンス！

フライドマッドクレイとリトルビルダーのワークショップ、巨大なインフレータブル障害物コース、そして無料アイスクリーム（在庫限り）など、ご家族全員で楽しめる誕生日イベントが盛りだくさん！

絶対に見逃せないパーティーです！

^利用規約が適用されます。*参加人数に限りがあります。

Robert está completando 22 anos e você está convidado para a melhor festa de aniversário de todos os tempos!

As festividades começam com a abertura antecipada dos portões e a entrada gratuita para crianças de até 14 anos^!

O trio australiano de indie pop Sheppard se apresentará ao vivo no Crocoseum Containers for Change. Além disso, você poderá curtir apresentações ao vivo por todo o zoológico com Gubbi Gubbi e African Beat!

Junte-se aos fotógrafos profissionais da CameraPro em uma aventura selvagem a pé para aprender dicas incríveis de fotografia* e colocar suas novas habilidades à prova no Safari Fotográfico do Robert, com a chance de ganhar um Pacote de Prêmios Incrível do Robert!

Há muita diversão para toda a família, com oficinas de argila Fried Mudd Clay e Little Builders, um enorme circuito inflável de obstáculos e sorvete grátis, enquanto durarem os estoques.

Esta é uma festa imperdível!

^Termos e Condições se aplicam. *Vagas limitadas.

罗伯特即将迎来22岁生日，诚邀您参加他最棒的生日派对！

庆祝活动从提前开放入场开始，14岁及以下儿童可免费入场^！

澳大利亚独立流行三人组Sheppard将在Containers for Change鳄鱼馆现场演出，此外，Gubbi Gubbi和African Beat乐队也将在动物园内带来精彩的现场表演！

加入CameraPro专业摄影师的行列，开启一段精彩的徒步探险之旅，学习一些绝妙的摄影技巧*，并在罗伯特的快照之旅中检验您的新技能，赢取一份超棒的罗伯特奖品包！

还有丰富多彩的生日娱乐活动，适合全家参与，包括Fried Mudd Clay和Little Builders工作坊、巨型充气障碍赛道以及免费冰淇淋（数量有限，先到先得）。

这是一场您绝对不想错过的派对！

^须遵守相关条款及细则。*名额有限。

Robert fête ses 22 ans et vous êtes invités à la meilleure fête d'anniversaire de tous les temps !

Les festivités commencent avec l'ouverture anticipée des portes et l'entrée est gratuite pour les enfants de 14 ans et moins^ !

Le trio indie pop australien Sheppard se produira en direct au Crocoseum Containers for Change. Profitez également des performances en direct de Gubbi Gubbi et African Beat dans tout le zoo !

Rejoignez les photographes professionnels de CameraPro pour une randonnée nature et apprenez des techniques de photographie exceptionnelles*. Mettez vos nouvelles compétences à l'épreuve lors du Safari Photo de Robert et tentez de gagner un coffret cadeau Ripper Robert !

De nombreuses activités d'anniversaire sont prévues pour toute la famille : ateliers Fried Mudd Clay et Little Builders, parcours d'obstacles gonflable géant et glaces gratuites (dans la limite des stocks disponibles).

Une fête à ne pas manquer !

^Voir conditions générales. *Places limitées.

로버트가 22번째 생일을 맞이했습니다! 최고의 생일 파티에 여러분을 초대합니다!

입장 게이트가 일찍 열리고, 14세 이하 어린이는 무료로 입장할 수 있습니다^!

호주 인디 팝 트리오 셰퍼드가 컨테이너스 포 체인지 크로코세움(Containers for Change Crocoseum)에서 라이브 공연을 선보이며 구비 구비(Gubbi Gubbi)와 아프리칸 비트(African Beat)의 동물원 전역 라이브 공연도 즐겨보세요!

CameraPro의 전문 사진작가들과 함께 신나는 워킹 어드벤처에 참여하여 멋진 사진 촬영 팁*을 배우고 로버트의 스냅샷 사파리(Robert's Snapshot Safari)에서 새로운 기술을 시험해 보세요. 리퍼 로버트 경품 팩(Ripper Robert Prize Pack)을 받을 수 있는 기회도 있습니다!

온 가족이 함께 즐길 수 있는 풍성한 생일 파티가 준비되어 있습니다. 프라이드 머드 클레이(Fried Mudd Clay)와 리틀 빌더스(Little Builders) 워크숍 거대한 풍선 장애물 코스 무료 아이스크림(재고 소진 시까지) 등 다양한 이벤트가 준비되어 있습니다.

놓치지 마세요!

^이용 약관이 적용됩니다. *좌석이 한정되어 있습니다.

羅伯特即將迎來22歲生日，誠摯邀請您參加他最棒的生日派對！

慶祝活動從提前開放入場開始，14歲及以下兒童可免費入場^！

澳洲獨立流行三人組Sheppard將在Containers for Change鱷魚館現場演出，此外，Gubbi Gubbi和African Beat樂團也將在動物園內帶來精彩的現場表演！

加入CameraPro專業攝影師的行列，開啟一段精彩的徒步探險之旅，學習一些絕妙的攝影技巧*，並在羅伯特的快照之旅中檢驗您的新技能，贏取一份超棒的羅伯特獎品包！

還有豐富多彩的生日娛樂活動，適合全家參與，包括Fried Mudd Clay和Little Builders工作坊、巨型充氣障礙賽道以及免費冰淇淋（數量有限，先到先得）。

這是一場您絕對不想錯過的派對！

^須遵守相關條款及細則。 *名額有限。

Robert wird 22 und du bist zur besten Geburtstagsparty aller Zeiten eingeladen!

Die Feierlichkeiten beginnen mit einer frühen Öffnung der Tore und freiem Eintritt für Kinder bis 14 Jahre^!

Das australische Indie-Pop-Trio Sheppard tritt live im Containers for Change Crocoseum auf. Außerdem gibt es im gesamten Zoo Live-Auftritte von Gubbi Gubbi und African Beat!

Begleite professionelle Fotografen von CameraPro auf ein spannendes Foto-Abenteuer, lerne tolle Fotografie-Tipps* und stelle dein Können bei Roberts Schnappschuss-Safari unter Beweis – mit etwas Glück gewinnst du ein cooles Robert-Überraschungspaket!

Es gibt jede Menge Geburtstagsspaß für die ganze Familie: Workshops mit „Fried Mudd Clay“ und „Little Builders“, einen riesigen aufblasbaren Hindernisparcours und gratis Eis (solange der Vorrat reicht).

Diese Party darfst du nicht verpassen!

^Es gelten die Teilnahmebedingungen. *Begrenzte Plätze verfügbar.

Robert compie 22 anni e sei invitato alla migliore festa di compleanno di sempre!

I festeggiamenti iniziano con l'apertura anticipata dei cancelli d'ingresso e l'ingresso gratuito per i bambini fino a 14 anni^!

Il trio indie pop australiano Sheppard si esibirà dal vivo al Containers for Change Crocoseum, e in più potrai goderti le performance dal vivo di Gubbi Gubbi e African Beat in tutto lo zoo!

Unisciti ai fotografi professionisti di CameraPro in un'avventura a piedi selvaggia per imparare alcuni consigli fotografici epici* e mettere alla prova le tue nuove abilità con Robert's Snapshot Safari per avere la possibilità di vincere un pacchetto premio Ripper Robert!

Ci sono un sacco di divertimento per tutta la famiglia con i laboratori di argilla fritta e piccoli costruttori, un percorso a ostacoli gonfiabile gigante e gelato gratis, fino a esaurimento scorte.

Questa è una festa da non perdere!

^Si applicano termini e condizioni. *Posti limitati disponibili.

¡Robert cumple 22 años y estás invitado a la mejor fiesta de cumpleaños de la historia!

¡Las festividades comienzan con la apertura anticipada de las puertas y entrada gratuita para niños menores de 14 años!

El trío australiano de indie pop Sheppard se presenta en vivo en el Crocoseum de Containers for Change. Además, disfruta de las presentaciones en vivo de Gubbi Gubbi y African Beat en todo el zoológico.

Únete a fotógrafos profesionales de CameraPro en una aventura a pie por la naturaleza para aprender increíbles consejos de fotografía* y pon a prueba tus nuevas habilidades con el Safari Fotográfico de Robert. ¡Podrás ganar un paquete de premios de Robert!

Hay muchísima diversión para toda la familia con talleres de Fried Mudd Clay y Little Builders, una pista de obstáculos inflable gigante y helado gratis hasta agotar existencias.

¡Esta es una fiesta que no te puedes perder!
